Contacts data.Name: O2 Ritz
Contacts data.Disabled facilities: Please get in touch with us before you buy your tickets between 12pm and 5pm, Monday to Friday on +44 (0)161 714 4140 or email us to advise your access and personal assistant requirements.
Contacts data.Nearest Bus Stop: The 104 and the 105 (Whitworth Street West) go to and from Manchester Piccadilly and Manchester Airport.43, 42, 143, 142 (Oxford Road) all go to and from Piccadilly Gardens are the nearest with stops outside the Palace Hotel
Contacts data.Parking: We're easy to get to by all major approach roads, including the M60 motorway. Just follow the City Centre or the Universities signs and our postcode for sat nav is M1 5NQ.
Contacts data.Nearest Train Station: The closest railway station is Manchester Oxford Road (MCO), which is about ten metres away, opposite the venue.

Contacts data.Name: Clapham Common
Contacts data.Ambiance: Chilled out park. Changes to outdoor club vibe for SW4 festival
Contacts data.Disabled facilities: The majority of the path(s) are wide enough for wheelchair users. There are accessible toilet facilities and bench seats situated along the paths for people to rest. https://www.accessable.co.uk/venues/clapham-common
Contacts data.Opening hours: Clapham Common is open 24 hours a day.
Contacts data.Parking: Parking is a nightmare. Most of the streets are resident permits only. You can park in these zones on Sundays all other days best bet is to use the tube.

Contacts data.Name: O2 Ritz
Contacts data.Disabled facilities: Please get in touch with us before you buy your tickets between 12pm and 5pm, Monday to Friday on +44 (0)161 714 4140 or email us to advise your access and personal assistant requirements.
Contacts data.Nearest Bus Stop: The 104 and the 105 (Whitworth Street West) go to and from Manchester Piccadilly and Manchester Airport.43, 42, 143, 142 (Oxford Road) all go to and from Piccadilly Gardens are the nearest with stops outside the Palace Hotel
Contacts data.Parking: We're easy to get to by all major approach roads, including the M60 motorway. Just follow the City Centre or the Universities signs and our postcode for sat nav is M1 5NQ.
Contacts data.Nearest Train Station: The closest railway station is Manchester Oxford Road (MCO), which is about ten metres away, opposite the venue.
